summary: Frontend Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using React and Angular.Passionate about clean code, automated testing, and delivering reliable user experiences. Proven track record in performance optimization, real-time architecture, and collaboration across global agile teams.

bullets: Engineered high-performance dental imaging software using Angular + TypeScript and .NET for real-time X-ray communication, achieving 60 FPS rendering.
Architected web-based image editor using Canvas and WebGL, serving 100+ dental groups with 99.9% WebSocket reliability.
Optimized performance using IndexedDB caching, code splitting and Docker-based deployments reducing load times by 20% with cross-browser compatibility.
Collaborated with QA and backend teams to debug real-time data issues across services, ensuring consistent reliability in production deployments.
Increased development velocity by 40% building reusable UI components using React + TypeScript for marketing automation platform.
Reduced web app load times by 66% through bundle optimization, lazy loading, and Redux state management for 10+ B2B customers.
Developed scalable frontend architecture and collaborated with UX teams to deliver high-engagement interfaces using Agile methodologies.
Practiced pair programming and thorough code reviews to maintain high-quality standards and clean code practices.

projects.name: Task Trekker
bullets: Built full-stack project management application with real-time collaboration, task tracking, and team coordination features.

projects.name: Applicant Tracking System
bullets: Developed responsive HR application for candidate tracking with filtering, sorting, and dashboard analytics.

projects.name: Decentralized Campaign Manager
bullets: Created blockchain-based crowdfunding platform enabling transparent campaign creation and funding via Ethereum smart contracts.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
bullets: Graduated with honors in Computer Science and Engineering
